entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-05-31
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [API Proposal]: Improve some reflection types - add not-null DeclaringType properties #86987
  • [JIT] Add embedded broadcast support to AVX512BW_BroadcastScalarToVector512 #86986
  • maybe create WASM module export from `[UnmanagedCallersOnly]` #86985
  • create WASM module import from any `[DLLImport]` which doesn't match known static native symbols #86984
    8.0.0
  • conv.i4 with NaN returns 0 on macOS M1 #86980
  • Interpreter stack overflows when trying to execute a particular EH pattern with AOT #86978
    8.0.0
  • System.Text.Json xunit generic theories not working in Native AOT. #86973
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: System.Diagnostics.ActivityContext.Current ability or similar #86966
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: Pass Meter to HttpClientHandler and SocketsHttpHandler #86961
    8.0.0
  • Frequent WebSocket Compression Segfault #86960
  • [wasm] WBT: Blazor tests failing to find `dotnet.native*js` #86959
    8.0.0
  • [Mono] Intrinsify System.Numerics.Vector4 API's with mini JIT on Arm64 #86957
    8.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Expose System.Runtime.Intrinsics.X86.Vaes and Avx512Vaes #86952
  • [API Proposal]: Add public GetMIC/VerifyMIC methods to NegotiateAuthentication #86950
  • is there any way to that vs 2022 exists using vswhere although i dont install it #86947
  • Can't run blazor hosted wasm when BlazorWebAssembly project's has private tags for references #86942
  • [API Proposal]: Utf8.IsValid(...) #86937

Closed

  • ConfigurationBuilder is not parsing boolean params without an explicit declaration #86977
  • tracing/eventpipe/eventsourceerror/eventsourceerror/eventsourceerror failure #80666
    8.0.0
  • DotNetBuildFromSource fail to compile src/libraries/shims/System.Data/ref/System.Data.csproj #86946
  • Could not load type 'SqlGuidCaster' from assembly System.Data.SqlClient on .NET 8 Preview #86969
  • JIT\Methodical\eh\finallyexec\nestedfinallycall_d failing with optimizations on #86561
    8.0.0
  • Events get ignored by COM in VBA (Excel) when invoked inside a Task #82628
  • The ConstructorBuilder and MethodBuilder generated parameter should not has default value by default. #20909
    8.0.0
  • Exception message for AmbiguousMatchException should include the name #18255
    Future
  • ILLink analyzer and code fixer passed twice to the csc #84119
    8.0.0
  • System.Text.Json's generator causes considerable package size increase #77897
    8.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Recognized internal namespace #86682
  • Planned System.Text.Json contract customization improvements for .NET 8 #71967
    8.0.0
  • JsonConverterAttribute not working with source-gen when converter is internal type #81703
    8.0.0
  • RSACertificateExtensions.GetRSAPublicKey Error #86845
  • [NativeAOT] Implement Interlocked.ReadMemoryBarrier() #84445
  • .NET 7 missing win32 System.IO.FileAttributes values #86955
  • Stack overflow exception thrown by `JsonSerializer.Deserialize` in a special case #85922
    8.0.0
  • CI failure in the "banana" rid leg on Centos Stream 8 #86169
    8.0.0
  • [BUG] Version downgrade in .NET 7 for System.IO.Compression.Native.dll leads to broken Microsoft Installers #82518
    7.0.x
  • Json source generator should support JsonConverter on non-nullable and nullable types #66547
    8.0.0
  • [8.0.100-preview.5.23276.4] Custom extended ToDictionary<TKey, TValue>() method conflicts with the one in System.Linq.Enumerable #86936
  • libhostfxr.so is not linked to libpthread and libdl.so #86940
  • [API Proposal]: Add build in UrlBase64 in runtime #86933
  • [API Proposal]: `ValueTextEquals` supporting `JsonEncodedText` as a parameter #86591
    Future
  • NativeAOT: Custom runtime without AppContext class throw #77054
    Future
  • [mono][aot] Loader tests failing on CI with Mono LLVM FullAOT #86327
    8.0.0
  • [8.0.100-preview.5.23276.4] After setting SocketsHttpHandler.AllowAutoRedirect property as false, the HttpResponseMessage.StatusCode changed from "Redirect" to "Found" #86857
  • [8.0.100-preview.5.23269.37] global tool "dotnet-snow" cannot load libSkiaSharp.dll #86571

PullRequests

Created

  • Added IReadOnlyDictionary to HttpRequestOptions #86983
    area-System.Net.Http, community-contribution
  • [wasm][debugger] Improve debugger performance based on JMC #86982
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2191755 #86981
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Update runtime-codeql.yml to run 3x/week #86979
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • adding vzeroupper before helper function call #86976
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Enable Native AOT testing in System.Text.Json. #86975
    area-System.Text.Json, 8.0.0
  • Add IHostApplicationBuilder interface #86974
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Hosting
  • [wasm][build] Don't use GetTempFileName; emit webcil to subdir of obj #86972
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • [mono] Add conditional substitution for IsDynamicCodeSupported when targeting ios-like platforms #86971
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono, os-ios
  • Revert "Revert "Change our Android build and test legs to use the new CBL-Mariner-based images."" #86967
    area-Infrastructure
  • Fix rounding error in getLikelyClassesOrMethods #86965
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • StringMarshalling behavior override tests #86963
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • Convert HttpListener to use public NegotiateAuthentication API #86956
    area-System.Net.Http, community-contribution
  • Reimplement NegotiateStream using (mostly) public NegotiateAuthenticaton API #86948
    area-System.Net.Security, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [mono][jit] Fix float to int/uint casting behavior #86941
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • [release/7.0-staging] [mono][aot] Generate 'native-indirect' wrappers in full-aot mode. #86934
    Servicing-consider, area-VM-meta-mono, 7.0.x
  • [CoreCLR] `UnsafeAccessorAttribute` non-generic support #86932
    area-VM-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • Use IUtf8SpanFormattable.TryFormat in a few more places #86931
    area-System.Text.Json

Merged

  • [wasm] Use an older version of chrome for testing `113.0.5672.63` #86968
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Clean-up error in `IDispatch::Invoke()` scenario #86964
    area-Interop-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Fix warnings found with CA1861 Avoid constant arrays as arguments #86229
    area-Meta
  • System.Data: override System.Data.Sql tfm only when ArcadeBuildFromSource. #86962
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution
  • [wasm] Exploit unallocated zero page to remove null checks in jiterpreter #86403
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Jiterpreter-mono
  • [RISC-V] Fix ReversePInvoke typo #86958
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Remove some working tests from issues.targets #86939
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • The ConstructorBuilder and MethodBuilder generated parameter should not have default value by default #84550
    area-System.Reflection.Emit, community-contribution
  • Add message details for AmbiguousMatchException #84512
    area-System.Reflection, community-contribution
  • Remove comment in ZipFile.Create.cs #86927
    area-System.IO.Compression, community-contribution
  • Cleanup BitMapper sizeof type #86881
    area-System.Diagnostics, community-contribution
  • Remove implicitly dependent reference #86938
    area-Extensions-Logging, community-contribution
  • Removed unnecessary string interpolation #86945
    area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution
  • [LoongArch64] redesign the Prolog/Epilog for enabling OSR. #86866
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64
  • Early out in impMarkInlineCandidate for minopts #86949
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm][bench] Limit initial samples #86953
    area-Infrastructure-mono, 8.0.0
  • [NativeAOT] implement Interlocked.ReadMemoryBarrier intrinsic #86842
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fix recursive type support when consuming source generated code from the .NET 6 sdk. #86821
    area-System.Text.Json, 8.0.0
  • CI: specify BaseOS for the unknown rid build. #86688
    community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • Use underlying type converter for nullable type #84208
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution
  • Use Knobs to populate AppContext switches #86883
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [mono][aot] Add support for deferred failures during AOT compilation #86554
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono, 8.0.0
  • [mono][interp] Preserve type information of stack args when inlining #86898
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2191208 #86925
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Do less work building Delegate.GetMethodInfo lookup #86930
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr

Updated

  • [NativeAOT] A few cleanups in stack walking on Windows #86917
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Share UTF8 converters between coreclr and mono #85558
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [mono] Perform the class init at runtime when static fields of BEFORE_FIELD_INIT type are accessed #86787
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Enable option to use the Windows ThreadPool #85373
    area-System.Threading
  • Enable EVEX feature: embedded broadcast for Vector128/256/512.Add() in limited cases #84821
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-avx512
  • [browser] Fix fingerprinting of relinked dotnet.js during build #86048
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 8.0.0
  • Add back cmake command-line cache on unix #86764
    area-Infrastructure
  • JIT: expand qmarks earlier #86778
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [IGNORE][wasm] Run sdk tests on wasm PRs #86744
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [wasm] Optimize jiterpreter type cast opcodes & add zero page optimizations #86928
    NO-MERGE, arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Jiterpreter-mono
  • Devirtualization with multiple guesses: JIT #86809
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Create DiagnosticInfo as an incremental Diagnostic replacement type. #86908
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • Read StartDiskNumber as uint32 #83923
    area-System.IO.Compression, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • [WIP] System.Linq.Expressions.Interpreter.CallInstruction creation should respect IsDynamicCodeSupported #86758
    NO-REVIEW, area-System.Linq.Expressions
  • JIT: make global morph its own phase, morph blocks in RPO #86822
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [Mono] Add the capability of trimming IL code of individual methods #86722
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • [wasm] Perf: Use `test-main.js` instead of `test-main-7.0.js` #86742
    arch-wasm, test-enhancement, area-VM-meta-mono, perf-pipeline
  • Use fully qualified type names for parameters and don't copy parameter attributes #86922
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • [RISC-V] Optimize Load Immediate #86790
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • ApplyStartupHook diagnostic IPC command #86813
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Update to the 22.04 debpkg image so we're on a newer ubuntu version. #86803
    blocked, area-Infrastructure-installer
  • Enable EventPipe support in MacOS #86766
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [browser][MT] GC, threadpool and some JS interop improvements #86759
    arch-wasm, area-System.Threading, 8.0.0
  • Upgrading SpanHelpers with Vector512 #86655
    area-System.Memory, community-contribution, arch-avx512
  • Unify trim warnings for accessing compiler generated code #86816
    area-Tools-ILLink, 8.0.0
  • [wasm][debugging] Enable debugging when Device Toolbar is enabled and Iphone is selected #86920
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono, 8.0.0
  • [wasm][debugger] Remove usage of GeneratedRegex #86911
    area-Debugger-mono
  • [debugger][mono] Block multithreading debugger failures #86501
    test-failure, arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Exclude things which broken on Loongarch #78850
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64
  • Expose IUtf8SpanParsable and implement it on the primitive numeric types #86875
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [mono][tests] Parallel AOT compilation of runtime tests on iOS platforms #86089
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-Infrastructure-mono, os-ios, 8.0.0
  • Test passing struct on a border of 12bit offset #86914
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • [NativeAOT] Improving HelloiOS sample for NativeAOT to be testable with runtime packs #86652
    NO-MERGE, os-ios, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • RemoveDirectoryRecursive: fix delete of mount points #86918
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • [mono][infra] Upgrade iOS performance queue to OSX 13 #86574
    area-Infrastructure-mono, 8.0.0
  • Enable getting command line from host during suspension #86116
    area-Tracing-coreclr
  • [API Proposal]: Add overload for EventSource primitives #83751
    api-approved, area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • Implemented IndexOf and LastIndexOf functions #86895
    NO-REVIEW, area-System.Globalization, os-mac-os-x, os-ios, os-tvos
  • [browser] Unify boot config schema #86255
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 8.0.0
  • Implement AsnReader.Clone #86913
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Formats.Asn1
  • [NativeAOT] A few changes to make stack walks a bit faster #86690
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Integrate HttpClientFactory and metrics #86888
    area-Extensions-HttpClientFactory
  • Save 260k in InitValueNumStoreStatics #85945
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [ILASM] Added `/DET` flag for deterministic compilations #85344
    area-ILTools-coreclr

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-05-31
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • BinaryFormatter is disabled in WinForms or WPF projects in preview6 #32941
  • ApiCompat flags introduction of a base exception type for exceptions previously inheriting from System.Exception #32922

Closed

  • .NET Cli with SQL Server Project Build throws error MSB4019 on build #32946
  • GenAPI IncludeVisibleOutsideOfAssembly --include-visible-outside is misnamed #32258

PullRequests

Created

  • Improve errors about unsupported aot scenarios #32943
    untriaged, Area-ILLink
  • [APICompat - PackageValidation] Enable baseline assembly references #32930
    untriaged, Area-ApiCompat
  • Containers: include the registry name when pushing an image. #32919
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • Reference ILLink analyzer matching ILLink version #32045
    untriaged, Area-ILLink
  • Rename GenAPI IncludeVisibleOutsideOfAssembly #32905
    Area-GenAPI

Updated

  • [release/7.0.4xx] excluded containerize from source-build #32895
    Area-Containers
  • Containers: add support for using 'podman' without a system 'docker' alias. #32783
    untriaged
  • Update the rid to the latest #32883
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-05-31
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • [Proposal]: Collection literals #5354
    Working Set

PullRequests

Updated

  • Add details to lookup rules for for extensions #7179
  • Update primary-constructors.md #7124

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-05-31
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Report Generator timing info in VS 'Report a problem' #68401
  • Applicable attribute target keywords not recommended for primary constructor parameters #68399
  • Is there a way to add restrictions to scripts to prevent them from using specific classes? #68393
  • IncrementalStepRunReason incorrect for new or removed attributes #68392
    17.7

Closed

  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build main-33731.205 #68397
  • Default parameters for IEnumerable is supported but doesn't work #33760
    Compiler.Next
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build main-33730.363 #68391

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix issues with pkgdef generation #68398
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Avoid spinning attempting to create a folder #68394
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Fix 'use primary constructor' with nested types. #68390
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Don't bind named members on missing attribute #68388
    Area-Compilers, 17.7

Merged

  • Fix common misspelling #68369
    Area-Compilers, Documentation, Community, Next
  • Localize release/dev17.7 branch #68395
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Ensure we always unregister a callback #68396
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Fix 'use primary constructor' when parameter name matches a keyword name #68385
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Snap 17.7 P2 #68387
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Update config for 17.7 P2 #68389
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Fix HasFileLocalTypes check for constructed types #68386
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Don't give duplicate member error for explicit implementations of different file-local interfaces with same source name #68331
    Area-Compilers, 17.7
  • Clear dead links to feature branches in `Language Feature Status.md` #68317
    Area-Compilers, Documentation, Community
  • Add new (hopefully easier) telemetry mechanism #68261
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Use GetResult(out Exception) method for awaits #67487
    Area-Compilers, PR For Personal Review Only, untriaged, Backlog
  • Use DelayTimeSpan where applicable #68338
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Update taggers to cooperate with each other for accessing the UI thread. #68381
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Update our 'delay until visible' logic to not throw cancellation exceptions #68382
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Support 'foreach' for inline arrays. #68297
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Inline Arrays
  • add Version.Details entries for source-build product build #68371
    Area-Infrastructure, Community, untriaged
  • Switch to primary constructors in IDE layer #68299
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Implement extension member lookup (non-generic) #68342
    Area-Compilers, C# 12.0
  • Expect mapped paths in InterceptsLocationAttribute #68242
    Area-Compilers, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-05-31
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Perf regression: mvc #48550
  • Perf improvement: endpoint, plaintext, plainTextSansFilter #48549
  • Application created from Worker Service template violates CPU usage limit and consume all available swap space #48548
  • QuickGrid Link Value #48552
  • RDF emits incorrect code when `ThrowOnBadRequest` is disabled with AsParameters and null binding #48547
  • LoadFromStoreCert method of the CertificateLoader class does not load a certificate with an exact subject match #48545
  • Duplicate click events #48542
  • Perf improvement: endpoint #48539
  • Perf improvement: json, plainTextEmptyFilter, plainTextNoParamsEmptyFilter #48538
  • Perf improvement: endpoint, mapaction, plainTextSansFilter #48537
  • Rename metrics counter names #48536
  • Missing File/Documents when trying to run the BestForYou: Blazor United Demo #48533
  • Add RateLimiterServiceCollectionExtensions.AddRateLimiter #48531
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Review types passed to metrics tags #48530
    .NET 8 Planning
  • ASP.NET Identity cookie value set to blank. #48529

Closed

  • Include Next Js 13 or latest version in template #48502
  • ComponentState isn't always disposed #48411
    8.0-preview5
  • ApplicationPartManager and IOC #48520
  • Blazor Style files for default project templates are not loaded correctly when using custom environment variables #48541
  • compile from source aspnetcore 6.0.16 report error #48540
  • Perf improvement: connectionclose, mapaction #48509
  • textarea binding does not work in Blazor Server when pasting long text #48505
  • Microsoft.AspNetCore.RateLimiting metrics #47745
  • Allow ProblemDetails property to be settable in ProblemDetailsContext #47633
    8.0-preview6

PullRequests

Created

  • Update RDG to use interceptors feature #48555
    feature-rdg, area-minimal
  • [Blazor] Take cascading parameter attribute type into account when supplying cascading values #48554
    area-blazor
  • RDF test migration (part 3) #48553
    feature-rdg, area-minimal

Merged

  • Update method modifiers to address CA1822 #48551
    needs-area-label, 8.0-preview6
  • [Blazor] Initial support for [SupplyParameterFromForm] #48412
    area-blazor, 8.0-preview6
  • Verify response json body #48534
    area-runtime, 8.0-preview6
  • Make problemdetails settable in problemdetailscontext #48510
    area-runtime, community-contribution, 8.0-preview6

Updated

  • [Blazor] Support for primitive types in [SupplyParameterFromForm] #48432
    area-blazor
  • Sections with other features #48518
    area-blazor
  • [7.0] Allow overriding the host header if doesn't match the absolute-form host #48415
    Servicing-approved, area-runtime, 7.0.x
  • Do not emit unused fields in RDG source #48426
    community-contribution, feature-rdg, area-minimal
  • [Blazor] Cache LayoutAttribute lookup #48439
    area-blazor
  • Implement output-cache store using redis #48450
    area-runtime, feature-output-caching
  • Introduce KestrelServerOptions.AllowUnsafeHostHeaderOverride #48460
    blocked, area-runtime
  • Avoid repetitive GCHandles in IIS WebSocket operations #48462
    servers-iis, area-runtime
  • Updated the AddPolicyRegistry extension methods to use TryAdd and TryAddEnumerable internally #47821
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Add dependency injection support for object pools #48217
    area-runtime
  • SDK update. #48511
    area-infrastructure
  • [wasm][debugging] Enable debugging when Device Toolbar is enabled and Iphone is selected #48527
    area-blazor
  • use new System.Text.Ascii APIs, remove internal helpers #48368
    area-runtime
  • Rename ASP.NET Core metrics #48375
    blocked, area-runtime, area-signalr
  • feat: add StringSyntaxAttribute for guid and timespan args #48402
    area-runtime, community-contribution

entry.title: dotnet/diagnostics - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-05-31
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • `timestamp` for `dotnet counters` in JSON Formatted Incorrectly #3905
    8.0.0

PullRequests

Updated

  • ApplyStartupHook diagnostic IPC command #3918

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-05-31
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [iOS] ScrollView not updating size when content size changes #15374
  • BlazorWebView.HostPage does not support URI pack notation #15373
  • while downloading Android emulator , "The operation has timed out." is showing. #15372
  • ICanvas DrawString does not work on MacCatalyst platform #15370
  • Blue window background in maui application #15366
  • MAUI Blazor Hybrid does not respect device language on iOS for datetime #15364
  • Border size changes appear to be animated on iOS/MacCatalyst #15363
  • Android dynamic theme change not working without styles.xaml file #15359
  • Switch Animation breaks on NavigationPage change #15358
  • IsVisible binding not showing items again if Shadow is set #15357
  • Application.Current.RequestedThemeChanged event only raises once #15350
  • White screen #15347

Closed

  • [M1] 7.0 Maui Blazor app displays blank on iOS 16.2 simulator. #13077
  • @jfversluis, @aokocax and @Dreamescaper - for now we got it to work here for a Maui-Blazor app with Android/Firebase by including the following libraries: #15369
  • Unable to debug MAUI app on Android with latest preview version #15329
  • Border in ScrollView will flicker when scroll on Android #9805
    Backlog
  • [MAC] Horizontal Options of child inside absolute layout is not working with "RightToLeft' flow direction #9970
    Backlog
  • CarouselView not displaying EmptyView when Loop is disabled #10056
    Backlog
  • [Android] Sign APK in release mode #15323
    Backlog
  • Winform BlazorWebView: Unable to open multiple Winform windows with BlazorWebView content #15308
  • RadioButton rendered incorrectly in MacCatalyst #15214

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/8.01xx-preview5] Latest changes from the net8 branch #15378
  • [release/8.0.1xx-preview5] [net8.0] Add insertion back #15377
  • [release/8.0.1xx-preview5] [net8.0] Run security compliance only on private build #15376
  • [release/8.0.1xx-preview5] [net8.0] Bump tizen to preview5 #15375
  • [net8.0] Bump tizen to preview5 #15368
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [net8.0] Merge main again #15367
  • [CI] Remove template explosion on the maui templates build tests. #15365
  • [net7.0] Run security compliance only on private build #15361
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Run security compliance only on private build #15356
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Remove netstandard2.1 #15355
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, do-not-merge
  • Bump Xamarin.UITest from 4.1.3 to 4.1.4 #15354
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget

Merged

  • [net8.0] Add insertion back #15352
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [net8.0] Run security compliance only on private build #15360
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️

    t/housekeeping ♻︎

    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [net8.0] Merge net8 3 #15337
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [CI] Remove the template explosion in the CI via a matrix #15340
    area/infrastructure 🏗️

Updated

  • Scrollview on Windows doesn't measure direct child on height changed #15248
    platform/windows 🪟, area/desktop 🖥️
  • Fixed removing items from the shell causing a crash #15098
    area/shell 🐢
  • [Android] Fix IsEnabled property on Android SearchBar #14616
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-entry
  • [Android] Fix issue invoking ReturnCommand #14972
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-entry
  • Add AppThemeColor #8839

  • Style specificity #13818
    area/Xaml </>
  • Add some tests for changing the app version properties #15338
  • [Windows/macOS] Implement menu key accelerators #14740
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/desktop 🖥️, control-menubar
  • [macOS] Implement IsEnabled property in MenuFlyoutItems #14920
    t/bug, platform/macOS 🍏, area/controls 🎮, control-contextmenu
  • [Android] Fix Border RoundRectangle CornerRadius issue #14995
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-border
  • Fix Label Multilinetruncation (MaxLines / LineBreakMode) #14918
    t/bug, area/controls 🎮, control-label
  • [Android] Fix SwipeView not swiping using Label as direct content #14824
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-swipeview
  • [Windows] Allow to customize the Shell FlyoutIcon #14663
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/shell 🐢
  • [iOS] Avoid crash setting custom icon in SearchHandler #14634
    t/bug, platform/iOS 🍎, area/shell 🐢
  • [Windows] Fix Border corners clipping issue #14403
    t/bug, area/drawing ✏️, area/controls 🎮, control-border
  • [Android] Allow to scroll horizontal WebView content inside TabbedPage #14320
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-webview
  • [Android] Fix gif animation initial state #14295
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-image
  • [Windows] Fix crash swapping MainPage #14262
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/navigation 🧭
  • Add SwipeItems to LogicalChildren #13864
    t/bug, area/controls 🎮, control-swipeview
  • [Windows] Changes in SwipeViewHandler #11229
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/controls 🎮, control-swipeview
  • [Windows] fixing window glitches while moving or resizing #14861

  • [X] Optimize OnPlatform element syntax #5611

  • Ensure "text boxes" preserve cursor location #15099

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-05-31
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • How do I configure properties of Json Columns in EF Core 7? #31012
  • Unable to project a collection inside a JSON column with EF Core 7 #31010
  • Add-Migration InitialCreate #31008
  • understanding change tracking in EF Core #31007
  • Clear error messages when scaffolding with customized T4 #31005
  • [SCAFFOLDING] Wrong scaffolding with quirky composite primary key #31004

Closed

  • Compiled Models: Entity Type Namespaces #30945
  • EF 7 not loading my entities when using Eager or Explicit loading (Blazor Server)... #30943
  • System.InvalidOperationException: 'Unable to translate set operation after client projection has been applied. Consider moving the set operation before the last 'Select' call.' #30942
  • Error when querying using collection of custom ids with value converters #30935
  • New Entity Id being set to 0 results in FK Violation #30928
  • Running with compiled model fails to load entity properties defined in abstract base class when in different assembly #30853
  • EF 7 not loading my entities when using Eager or Explicit loading... #31009

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/6.0] Microsoft.Data.Sqlite: Fix handling of queries with RETURNING clause #31013
  • Fixes attempt to scaffold triggers on synapse re: issue #30998 #31011
  • Remove implicitly dependent reference #31006
  • Add complex types to Metadata #31003

Updated

  • Translate to IN + subquery when possible instead of EXISTS #30976
  • Bump SQLitePCLRaw from 2.1.4 to 2.1.5 #30949
    area-infrastructure, auto-merge, type-dependency update :arrow_up_small:
  • Normalize Any to Contains instead of vice versa #30956
  • Update exception message for Cosmos subquery pushdown #30849
  • Add support for DATA_COMPRESSION and SORT_IN_TEMPDB SQL Server index options #30831
  • Generate OPENJSON with WITH unless ordering is required #30983
  • Disregard parameter names in `ExpressionEqualityComparer.GetHashCode` #30755
    waiting-for-response

entry.title: dotnet/installer - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-05-31
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • Microsoft .Net Core Version 5.0.17 keeps reinstalling #14473

PullRequests

Created

  • Enable source-build pvp flow for installer #16550
  • Add preview 5 to the installer table #16547
  • Update 7.0 ILLink version #16546
  • Only list supported RIDs for ILCompiler #16545
  • Patch for net8.0 targeting in nuget.client #16541
  • Add source-build patch to eliminate razor prebuilts #16536

Merged

  • Do not try to restore ASP.NET on linux-bionic #16529
  • Remove win-arm support in net8 #16496
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 1224: Build ID 2191622 #16485
  • Ignore CA1822 for aspnetcore #16544
  • Enable source build PVP flow for aspnetcore #16543
  • Enable per repo pvp for format, fsharp, and test-templates #16540
  • 7.0.1xx: ignore WarnOrErrorOnTargetArchitectureMismatch. #16502
  • enable repo pvp for runtime #16532
